DOC.brief_summary: 1600 patients with severe, end stage renal disease or post transplant will be randomised 1:1:1 to either standard therapeutic education; or education using a specific app; or the enhanced interactive app using feedback messages. The total follow up duration is 18 months. Primary endpoint is the cost utility of using app-based therapeutic intervention, secondary endpoints are: compliance with treatment guidelines, app use (professionals and patients), budget impact analysis
DOC.brief_title: Economic Evaluation of an Education Platform for Patients With End-stage Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: severe endstage renal disease Internet, literacy informed consent did not fill the screening questionnaire
